main

Class EnemyModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.UnitModel
      • main.EnemyModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyAlgae, EnemyChemical, EnemyIce, EnemyLitter, EnemyPathogens, EnemyPoo

    public abstract class EnemyModel
extends UnitModel
    The super class for all enemy types. It contains the attributes that all enemies should have and inherits from UnitModel. This will control the path movement of the enemies that are on the screen.
    Author:
    Ryan Barbera, Aaron George, Nick Norton, Thomas Pennington, Grant Zhao

    • Method Detail

      • moveToward

        public boolean moveToward(Posn destination)
        Moves this enemy toward its current direction, and returns true if this enemy reaches the given destination and false otherwise. If the corner of the image has not reached the destination, then it keeps moving in the current direction and will add either x or y values.
        Parameters:
        destination - the x coordinate of the next destination direction
        Returns:
        true or false depending if the enemy has reached its destination

      • updateDirection

        public void updateDirection(Posn destination)
        Sets this enemy's direction(s) of motion based on the given destination from the posns that were created. The directions that a particular path could be taking is north, south, east, and west. It increments one of the directions based on the x and y positions of each enemy that is one the board.
        Parameters:
        destination - the current x, y position on the game map that the enemies are traveling on
